description:
Mahha Noriko is a young Amanto who immigrated to Earth from the Express Planet (快速星) to start a job as an "Express Delivery Girl". Her goal is to become the best Delivery Girl in the Galaxy. Members of her species need to stay in constant motion and have the wind in their face, if they stop for even a second they will start coughing up blood and possibly die.
Character design was based on drawing of Saitou-san (斉藤さん) from Tokyo, the winner of Amanto Boshuu (天人募集) contest.
name: Mahha Noriko
